summary: See and feel what it was like when dinosaurs ruled the Earth, in a story where an underdog dino triumphs to become a hero for the ages.
cast: Charlie Rowe|Karl Urban|Angourie Rice|John Leguizamo|Justin Long|Skyler Stone|Tiya Sircar|Clay Savage|Jude Tinsely|Mary Mouser|Katie Silverman|Madison Rothschild|Michael Leone
title: Caminando entre dinosaurios
